body:
[Bookshelf]: The books are all really old, but some of them are less dusty - probably recently used. 

[1]: [Pick some books] 
[2]: [Leave them be]
title: Start1

body:
[Forbearance]: "Taking the dustier books could kill you. Be careful."

[1]: [Pick the cleaner ones] 
[2]: [Try to take a dusty old book (Forbearance | DC 15)] 
[3]: [Leave the books alone]
title: PickTheBooks

body:
[Forbearance]: The books you see look both boring and useless, peraphs the old ones are better. 

[1]: [Try to take a dirt book (Forbearance | DC 15)] 
[2]: [Give Up]
title: PickClean

body:
[Forbearance]: Your body reacts. Badly. These books are probably older than you. (-1 Health) 

[1]: [Take them]
title: PickFail

body:
[Forbearance]: Dust is nothing against you. You. Are. Strong. 

[1]: [Take the books with you]
title: PickPass

body:
[Bookshelf]: You already got what you wanted. You should probably avoid this dusty bookshelf. 

[1]: [Leave them be]
title: Start2
